title: Portland Timbers v St. Louis City: Hosts have new energy after deserved break, says Neville
description: Portland Timbers head coach Phil Neville believes there is a new energy among his players, having had plenty of rest ahead of their upcoming league clash with St. Louis City. The Timbers played eight games across May in all competitions, but have not taken to the field since a 2-1 victory over 10-man Colorado Rapids […] The post Portland Timbers v St. Louis City: Hosts have new energy after deserved break, says Neville appeared first on Soccer News.

title: De la Fuente: Facing Portugal and Ronaldo a ´blessing´ in Nations League final
description: Luis de la Fuente described Spain’s Nations League final against Portugal as a “blessing” as they prepare to face Cristiano Ronaldo at the Allianz Arena on Sunday. Spain booked their place in the showpiece match with an enthralling 5-4 victory over France on Thursday, as Barcelona wonderkid Lamine Yamal scored twice.
